summary: This mod adds a new follower named Veloth he's a dark elf who uses a sword in the right hand and he casts flames, firebolt or incinerate with his left hand.
descriptionHtml: This mod adds a new follower named Veloth he's a dark elf who uses a sword in the right hand and he casts flames, firebolt or incinerate with his left hand. You can find him in the Sleeping giant inn at Riverwood. He has no equipped weapons or armor so you can customize him. Keep in mind that he uses heavy armor.
author: Modsrim
